comments.body: What happens if both flags are specified?
they address the same variable, the last one specified wins, and use of the deprecated one prints a warning

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@	fs.DurationVar(&o.ClusterSigningDuration.Duration, "cluster-signing-duration", o.ClusterSigningDuration.Duration, "The length of duration signed certificates will be given.")
	fs.DurationVar(&o.ClusterSigningDuration.Duration, "experimental-cluster-signing-duration", o.ClusterSigningDuration.Duration, "The length of duration signed certificates will be given.")
	fs.MarkDeprecated("experimental-cluster-signing-duration", "use --cluster-signing-duration")
}
